title: ARAM recalls
body: I know ARAM was updated so that we can use the "B" recall button to show off recall moves. I've tested with a few champs and it works but when I played Gate Keeper Galio the other day and hit "B" it did nothing. Not sure if it's a bug or just an oversight but I wanted to mention it.

replies.body:
Hey Bixits,

As Dryad Soraka mentioned, some of the old skins do not have recalls, so nothing will play when you hit 'B' on Howling Abyss or any other map.
That explains a lot, actually. So it only plays if the skin you're using has a special recall animation?
The first part of the final boss veigar b when he jumps back into the first portal is glitched, the first code portal didn't show up for me the other night
It's not just you - this is something we're aware of and working to fix! :]
Can't wait to spam my b's in style :)

Gatekeeper Galio doesn't have a recall :(

Why they didn't add a recall when they updated him is beyond me, especially on a legendary skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Dryad Soraka,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=WlNn9Rj5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-06T18:00:58.244+0000)
>
> Gatekeeper Galio doesn't have a recall :(
> 
> Why they didn't add a recall when they updated him is beyond me, especially on a legendary skin.

Thanks for all the replies everyone ^^ I own several legendary skins and I guess I assumed they all (but the retired ones) had a recall. Up until recently I've really only played ARAM so I never tested them out anyways.  Thank you Katey for the clarification :)
Kalista recall don't have the shadow appearing. She looked much more cooler with the shadow appearing at her back.
Not as bad as losing promos to a in game glitch during champion select.
